name: XWUI Result Component
description: Result page/section component for displaying operation results with status icons. Supports success, error, info, and warning statuses with customizable icons, titles, descriptions, and extra content.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the result

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

icon.description: Custom icon HTML string (overrides default status icon)

extra.description: Extra content element or HTML string to display below description
